props.align: Places the timeline dot at the top or center of the timeline item.
props.direction: Display timeline in a **vertical** or **horizontal** direction.
props.justify: Places timeline line at the center or automatically on the left or right side.
props.lineInset: Specifies the distance between the line and the dot of timeline items.
props.linePosition: Shift the position of the line. By default the line will evenly split items before/after.
props.mirror: Mirror the before/after ordering of timeline items.
props.side: Display all timeline items on one side of the timeline, either **before** or **after**.
props.truncateLine: Truncate timeline directly at the **start** or **end** of the line, or on **both** ends.
